page.title: 19A Day In My Life 2
page.content: We went by bus to Eccles Pool. We got back at 10 past 3 and I brought my notebook up to date 'till school ended at 3.30pm. Then I met by mum and went home and made a sandwich. Afterwards I practised my clarinet until teatime. After tea I cleared the table and put the dishes into the dishwasher. At six o'clock I went to Brownies at the Institute where we did a picture. My mum picked me up at 8pm. Back home I put Alison to bed and read her a story. When I came down stairs I watched 'Minder' on TV while I had a hot drink. At 10 past 9 I went to clean my teeth and then read my book in bed. At 9.30 my mum came in to say 'Good Night' and soon I was fast asleep.
